report.title: Experimenting with Doses
report.author: Happy Catipilar
report.bodytext: I found myself unemployed with free time between school schedules, so I thought I'd put it to good use. /n /n /n /n /n From known weights, usually 250 mg or 100 mg, I have eyeballed divisions to guess at my pill weights. So there is probably a +/-5% involved. /n /n This report is specifically for a series of trials with 2C-E. /n /n 12.5 mg ingested orally proves very visual, but physiologically overwhelming, vomiting is probably a given. /n /n 8.66 mg orally relieves the physical, although the emotionally unstable my still have a bit of difficulty integrating (and will still pop.) This is my dose in snuff, a bit harder than the 12.5 mg oral dose, but 2c-e has an effect within 15 minutes by this route, otherwise it can take an hour to two hours. /n /n 2ct-2 trials, 31.25 mg oral. /n /n The trip was amazing, the visuals were almost constant... distinctly distortions of what I was seeing though, nothing manifested as with a pot/acid combo. I make mention of this chem though, for it has greater potential as a synergist. 2c-e, usually at 10 mg with 20-25mg 2ct-2 creates oceans out of carpet, rainbows from white walls, etc. /n /n Trips are usually visual for 5 hours after onset; for 2C-E and 2c-I. The visuals are pretty hard to ignore the first 3 of those (I refer to it as the self-guided phase). /n /n 2C-E becomes unbearable past 2x a dose.
